title: What to do if told to *die* and being abused in Champ select?
body: Just got abused by some guy, can i report him somehow? he dodged too.

replies.body:
Best course of action is to just forget and move on. There's better things in life to be thinking about.

If you were really affected by it, though, there is one thing you can do. [Submit a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
